content: our basic hot water bottle pattern 1 just got a makeover this simple and cozy cover is worked either in the round or flat from the bottom up it is fast to knit up no matter your skill level and is now covered in cute squishy bobbles **yarn ** 1 skein or approximately 170-200m of any 8ply/dk weight yarn we used eva by great ocean road woollen mill **needles ** flat version 4 00mm and 3 50mm straight needles in the round - 4 00mm and 3 50mm 80cm circular needles **gauge ** 22 stitches and 30 row to 10cm in stocking stitch 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/hot-water-bottle-cover-48
